description: This table stores details about the recommendation of a community resource for a patient. This table can be joined with the COMMUNITY_RESOURCE_CNCT table on COMMUNITY_RESOURCE__LAST_UPDATE_RECOM_CSN_ID and COMMUNITY_RESOURCE_CNCT__RECOMMENDATION_CSN_ID in order to form a resulting table that includes all current information about the community resource recommendation.

columns.name: RECOMMENDATION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the recommendation record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the record status (hidden, soft-deleted, or both)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: RECORD_TYPE_CRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of this community resource recommendation record, used to differentiate various implementations of the CRC masterfile.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Recommendation


Encounter Level

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient this community resource recommendation is for.

columns.name: CREATING_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The patient encounter in which this community resource recommendation was created.

columns.name: RESOURCE_FACILITY_POS_ID
columns.description: The community based organization to which the patient was recommended or referred.

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date the record was created

columns.name: RESOURCE_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The department to which the patient was recommended or referred.

columns.name: RESOURCE_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider to which the patient was recommended or referred.

columns.name: RESOURCE_PROV_ADDRESS_ID
columns.description: The unique address ID associated with the provider record to which the patient was recommended or referred.

columns.name: DP_COORD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The coordination type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Destination


Durable Medical Equipment


Dialysis/Infusion


Home Medical Care


Community Resources
